'''''Mujina-Class Ninja''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the challenge in ''[[Operation Substitution#Twinjutsu|Twinjutsu]]'' within 30 seconds.
